dialogue: Hey! Thanks for picking up. Um, are you slinging those crunchy, crunchy, Tiki Tacos?
That’s why they pay me the big bucks. How’s it going with you?
Okay. Well, bad actually. My grandma is missing and I’m camped out at an old folks home with my parents.
What? Wait, how?

She went to visit a friend and they... went missing together. It’s been a couple of hours so far. It’s sort of unclear... the whole thing. They didn’t sign out or anything. But I was supposed to watch her, so...
...Could she have just gone somewhere without telling you guys? Is that possible?
We thought it could be a Souplantation situation.
A what?
Never mind-- um, it’s possible, I guess.
I only bring it up because she’s obsessed with errands right?
She has a healthy respect for errands, yeah.
I know how much you love her and I’m sure you’re really worried but maybe she’s just... doing something? On her own?
Yeah. I hope so.

Hey, I’ve also been wanting to call you. I’ve been thinking about taking some classes. Learning some new skills. Maybe even like an adult math class, figured I could brush up on some of the essentials.
What are you talking about?
Self-improvement. I’m just saying I can learn to do more things. Adding. Subtracting. Fractals... I can take the... great leap-- from boy to man!
You’re driving me nuts, you know that?
I do! I do know that. Very much. A pause.
Ugh, it’s hot in here--
Go take a walk.
My folks asked me to stay close...
Well, if you ever do take that great leap. For what it’s worth, I think you could make it.
Oh my god!
What?
There’s been a guy in here the whole time.
